text: ⚠️“WHO Informal consultation on potential role of #chloroquine in clinical management of #COVID19 infection”: ➡️Mixed findings. 📌Prophylaxis use led to delayed immune response (bad). 📌But effective against #SARSCoV2 in vitro (good). Ruling: “equipoise”🤷🏻‍♂️ https://t.co/9CJPs5vOg5 https://t.co/wsWbnyZpX0
